name: Dark And Fear -Old Shadows
description:
Dark and Fear is a game where the player has the opportunity to choose how the game will end, live or die it's up to you.
The game have a small story about a boy trying to find his brother but everything it's more clear at the end of the game.
The game contain 1 easter egg and at the end of the game maybe you have the opportunity to play the bonus mission but this depends on the way you end the game.
If your computer it's old you can play the game in low resolution but you will have bad graphics.
If you have any questions, please feel free to ask.

GameTrailer - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SUi558xAhZ8
